document_data.name: Menziphur
document_data.mainbody: '''Menziphur''' was the court alchemist in [[Cormyr]] as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: The man could be extremely sneaky; hopefully, he could do alchemy as well.
document_data.History: [[Glathra Barcantle]] sought out Menziphur in the aftermath of the [[Council of the Dragon]] briefly, before she was sidetracked by the presence of [[Arclath Delcastle]] and [[Amarune Whitewave]].
